mapper.insert: insert into prod (prod_name, prod_singer, prod_price, prod_content, prod_stock, prod_category) values (#{prod_name}, #{prod_singer}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_content}, #{prod_stock}, #{prod_category})
mapper.select: select * from prod order by prod_num DESC
select * from Image where img_type = '대표이미지' order by prod_num desc
select * from prod order by prod_num DESC
select * From image where prod_num = #{prod_num} and img_type = '대표이미지'
select * From image where prod_num = #{prod_num} and img_type = '상세이미지'
mapper.insert: insert into cart (prod_count, username, prod_num, cart_reg) values (#{amount}, #{username}, #{prod_num}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart c left join prod p on c.prod_num = p.prod_num where c.username = #{username} order by cart_reg DESC

SELECT i.prod_num, i.img_name, i.img_uuid, i.img_path FROM cart c left join prod p on c.prod_num = p.prod_num left join image i on p.prod_num = i.prod_num where c.username = #{username} and i.img_type = '대표이미지' order by cart_reg DESC
